page.title: 15NAIRN:DELNIES CARAVAN SITE
page.content: Delnies caravan site is situated on the A96(T) from Nairn to Inverness.The caravan site is useful to tourists comming along the road.However,the site is not just for tourists,but also for families who are waiting to be housed by Nairn District Council. The site has got:a toilet block(with showers),disposal units, fire beaters(because the camp is surounded by wood land),2 play parks and water taps.Tourist come to Delnies Caravan site because it has a lovely atmosphere,for it is surrounded by tall pine trees.In mid summer the sun shines through the trees so the carvan site can be really warm. Delnies Caravan Site is owned by Scotia Caravans.They also own another caravan site in Nairn.The site is at the beach.Unlike Delnies it has got a food shop and gift shop.
